data.name: TreeTable_Desc_Key
data.value: Displays project tasks in a hierarchical tree with drag & drop reordering and selection.

data.name: Task_ID_Desc_Key
data.value: The field containing the task's unique ID (msdyn_projecttaskid).

data.name: Task_Name_Desc_Key
data.value: The field containing the task's name (msdyn_name).

data.name: Parent_Task_ID_Desc_Key
data.value: The field containing the ID of the parent task (msdyn_parenttaskid).

data.name: Display_Order_Desc_Key
data.value: The field containing the task's display order (msdyn_displayorder).

data.name: Selected_Task_ID_Desc_Key
data.value: Outputs the ID of the currently selected task.

data.name: Updated_Order_Data_Desc_Key
data.value: Outputs JSON data of tasks with updated display order.
